body:
**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.):

* `Init:rpc error: code = 2`
* `failed to write to cpu.cfs_quota_us`

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
```
$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.0", GitCommit:"fff5156092b56e6bd60fff75aad4dc9de6b6ef37", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-28T16:36:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.1", GitCommit:"b0b7a323cc5a4a2019b2e9520c21c7830b7f708e", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-04-03T20:33:27Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: GKE
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`):
- **Install tools**:
- **Others**:


**What happened**:

An init container for a pod that defined resource requests & limits fails immediately on 1.6.1 with the error below.

```
$ kubectl --context=staging apply -f /tmp/repro.yaml 
pod "no-init-requests" created

$ kubectl --context=staging get pod no-init-requests -a
NAME               READY     STATUS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        RESTARTS   AGE
no-init-requests   0/1       Init:rpc error: code = 2 desc = failed to start container "2de2a8b69e8836452767a60d15a29b16ebd1f48fa7bf503a9fe6f5cc3a817f5a": Error response from daemon: rpc error: code = 2 desc = "oci runtime error: failed to write 200000 to cpu.cfs_quota_us: write /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu,cpuacct/kubepods/pod84aef4e9-2577-11e7-bb35-42010a8000d5/2de2a8b69e8836452767a60d15a29b16ebd1f48fa7bf503a9fe6f5cc3a817f5a/cpu.cfs_quota_us: invalid argument"   1          12s
```

**What you expected to happen**:

PodSpec works fine on a 1.5.x cluster:

```
$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.0", GitCommit:"fff5156092b56e6bd60fff75aad4dc9de6b6ef37", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-28T16:36:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"5", GitVersion:"v1.5.6", GitCommit:"114f8911f9597be669a747ab72787e0bd74c9359", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-28T13:36:31Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

$ kubectl apply -f /tmp/repro.yaml 
pod "no-init-requests" created

$ kubectl get pod no-init-requests -a
NAME               READY     STATUS      RESTARTS   AGE
no-init-requests   0/1       Completed   0          10s
```

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
repro.yaml is below.  Removing the "resources" spec of init-containers makes the Pod usable.

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: no-init-requests
  annotations:
    pod.beta.kubernetes.io/init-containers: |
      [
        {
          "name": "restore",
          "image": "busybox",
          "imagePullPolicy": "IfNotPresent",
          "resources": {
            "requests": {"cpu": "2000m", "memory": "2Gi"},
            "limits": {"cpu": "2000m", "memory": "2Gi"}
          },
          "command": [
            "/bin/echo",
            "hello",
            "world"
          ]
        }
      ]
spec:
  restartPolicy: Never
  containers:
  containers:
  - name: truncate
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 1Gi
      limits:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 1Gi
    command:
    - echo
    - foo
    - bar
```

title: init-containers with resource requests/limits fail to schedule with "oci runtime error: failed to write NNN to cpu.cfs_quota_us"
